Creator: Michael McComas. \n\n Dinnerly is the app to solve all your indecisive dinner decision needs! You can select options to choose between in our category list and the app will decide which place to go and display places that fit near you.
If you have any questions or concerns please do not hesitate to leave a review on the Google Play store. We will get back to you as soon as possible!

The categories listed below are some of the most common types of restaurants. 

Select a minimum of two categories and click the randomize button. The app will then select one of the selected categories at random and display places that fit near you. 

 You can view descriptions of the categories by selecting the arrow beside the category name.
